resources.string: About PvP Reward Track

The PvP Reward Track contains PvP-specific rewards for doing PvP activities in the game. The track can be completed and run again to get a different selection of rewards, with more prestigious rewards becoming available as more tracks are completed.
Progress your track by defeating other players and engaging in PvP Missions, War, Outpost Rush, Capturing Forts, and 3v3 Arenas.

Azoth Salt is a currency that allows you to acquire rewards from the PvP Track. You can gain Azoth Salt by engaging in War, Outpost Rush, 3v3 Arenas, PvP Missions, killing players in the open world, and earning XP while flagged.
Choose between unique rewards such as prestige armor and weapons, emotes, currencies, and consumables.

At level 60, you're now able to<font color="#ffdb7a"> upgrade your equipment </font>to higher gear scores. To do this, you'll need to harvest Gypsum from various Level 60 activities and locations. Visit a<font color="#ffdb7a"> Gypsum Kiln </font>to learn more.
<font color="#ffffff" >You've recently achieved Max Level - there's plenty more to do.</font>
Endgame Expeditions, including rotating weekly Mutations for the best rewards.
Elite landmarks, Trial Arenas, and open world challenges for groups.

At level 60, you're now able to<font color="#ffdb7a"> upgrade your equipment </font>to higher gear scores. To do this, you'll need to harvest Gypsum from various Level 60 activities and locations. Visit a<font color="#ffdb7a"> Gypsum Kiln </font>to learn more.
About Endgame Activities

Available now from the map! Access all Expeditions (as long as you have visited it once) by clicking on the Expedition's icon. From here you can browse or post Group Finder lobbies, or enter the Expedition directly with your existing group.
About Group Finder
Fresh worlds. Fresh economy. Fresh start.
Arm yourself with the all-new Great Sword and Heartgem and journey to the deserts of Brimstone Sands, or start the new Main Story quest!
Begin your journey in a fresh world, and watch your favorite streamers do the same in the Return to Aeternum event on Twitch until 11/18.
Brimstone Sands, Great Sword, and Nightveil Hallow items are now available in the store. Don't forget to pickup your free anniversary skins!

With the new Great Sword and Heartgem ability runes, explore the new Brimstone Sands zone and the Ennead Expedition, or experience the revamped Main Story Quest with new locations, NPCs, challenges, and rewards.\n\nTo access the main storyline quests in Brimstone Sands, players must have completed the quest "A Selfless Nature" in Edengrove and the quest "Strider of the Sands," which can be picked up in multiple locations.

Start a new character on worlds that are certified fresh, or follow your favorite streamers in the Return to Aeternum event on Twitch. Watch as they battle for glory on fresh worlds until 11/18.\n\nhttp://www.twitch.tv/playnewworld
Fresh Start Worlds are now live! Only new characters can be a part of these worlds.
About Return to Aeternum

About Battle For New World
The Free Weekend is in progress.

During this limited-time event, experience the new Brimstone Sands zone, revamped Main Story Quest, and latest updates to New World for free!

To play with friends, characters must be on the same world. Free players enjoy unlimited session times unless there is a queue for the world (at the end of a session, free players will be asked to requeue).

New players can also save 50% on the Standard and Deluxe editions of New World when purchased between December 15 at 10AM PT and January 5 at 10AM PT.

About Free Weekend

Leaderboards track various New World activities across settlements and factions. Compete with other players in various individual, company, and faction activities to ascend the leaderboards, which reset periodically.\n\n<font color="#ffdb7a">Access Leaderboards in the Modes Menu. </font>

Protect yourself from the ravages of Forever Winter with new cosmetics available in the store! You'll want to kit yourself out with the latest winter weapons and apparel when the days grow shorter and long nights of terror await. Check the store regularly for free gifts in December and take advantage of our winter sales! Special unvaulted content goes on sale 12/13 and last year's Winter Convergence gear arrives on 12/20!
About Winter Convergence

Is the shape of winter the shadow of a dragon? Visit the store for new cosmetics kissed by the frosty breath of the serpent! Don't get caught unprepared when less lethal combat breaks out! Pick up the Slap Fight emote or opt for the Tiptoe Walk in order to sneak past any violent squabbles instead!
About Winter Dragon

Will winter release its icy grasp upon the land or will spring blossom and bring new hope to Aeternum? Consult your oracle and outfit yourself with the new skins in the Store! New heart emotes can help you find romance amid the long, dark days of winter!
About Omens Of Winter
Legendary foundry where Ancients forged their devastating engines of war. Those who hunger for power yearn for the eldritch magics unleashed in these colossal ruins.
About Empyrean Forge
Embark on a new journey with Grace O'Malley as she forms Aeternum's newest mercenary company, the Silver Crows.

The fires of the Forge burn brightly within this month's new store items! Feel the burn with brand new skins and decor items. Get into the competitive spirit with new emotes that can express your triumph or comfort your poor, humbled enemies! Get them while they're hot!

Scoundrels and brigands are on the loose in Aeternum! Outfit yourself in the store with new Highwaymen items and join their ranks. Don the garb of the Ringleader and take charge with three variants of headgear - perfect for whatever level of disguise you require!

Dost thou hath weapons and armor from the days of Yore? Gothic skins based on real designs from the 16th and 17th centuries are now available to buy in the store. Smite your foes while wearing solid steel fit for a hero of old, or strike terror in your enemies while clad in menacing armor. Regardless of your choice, your rivals will shudder in fear when you brandish thine weapon. With these tried and true armaments, victory on the field of battle is nearly ensured.
About Knights Errant
There's riches to be had on Aeternum for those willing to take them. Outlaws and brigands should head to the store for new apparel and weapon skins. Don't wander the wasteland unprepared!
About Wasteland Frontier
Outpost Rush now supports cross world play! Eliminate enemies, collect resources and fortify defenses with players from anywhere in your region.
Scoring: More points for defending, capturing, and tanking.
Summon Stones: Removed Azoth costs. Close the portal for the Demon Stone, and slay the Alpha Wolf for the Bear Stone.
Baroness: New barriers added to its arena.
About Cross-World Outpost Rush

The Angry Earth have overrun Old First Light. Answering the sinister call of the Ancient huntress Adiana, they've destroyed homes and taken our friends captive, now subjecting them to unknown horrors behind a wall of thorns barring entry to any adventurers.
Quests: All regional quests from Old First Light have been canceled.
Storage: Once all items are claimed, Old First Light storage will be closed.
Trading Post: Any pending transactions are accessible from other territories.
Housing: A compensation for the loss of housing has been made. All furniture from your home has been placed in the storage.
Governing Company: A one-time deposit has been paid into your treasury for the loss of the territory.
About First Light Has Fallen

The rekindled fires of Ennead called the primal terror from the deep beneath the sands. Now the Great Devourer stalks the dunes of Brimstone once again. Gather your bravest warriors at the Ambuscade. Can you defeat the spawn of the Titans? \n\n<font color="#edc63e">Requires 20 person raid group.</font>
About Arena of Shah Neshen

Dark forces have unearthed The Hatchery, a long-forgotten chamber, buried deep beneath the sands of Neapolis. There, they conspire to rip Aeternum asunder with a horde of sandwurms.\n\nRally with up to nine other adventurers to crush wave after wave of enemies in this high stakes, high reward trial. Stand victorious, and walk away with unique riches.
About The Hatchery

A new epic adventure awaits you and the Silver Crows in the sweltering heat of Brimstone Sands.

Malek, a man claiming to be with the ancient order Blood of the Sands, is willing to pay you handsomely for primordial artifacts - Sandwurm eggs.
Join Grace O'Malley, Zander, and a new cast of characters as you discover the ancient power that has awakened beneath the shifting dunes.

<font color="#edc63e">Level 60 players</font> can start their adventure by visiting any Crow's Nest location found in Edengrove, Shattered Mountain, and Brimstone Sands.
About Season Two
The fight promoter, Maximus Marcellus, is spreading word of a ruined gladiatorial pit in Brimstone Sands.\n\nGather your team and your wits to master this new arena of varying heights!
About New 3v3 Arena Map
